1. tệp .pcapng -> xài wireshark. xài follow TCP -> xem all thứ

3. đoạn code để giải mã tìm flag:
```
n = 882564595536224140639625987659416029426239230804614613279163
e = 65537
def rsa(mess):
    return pow(mess,e,n)
mess = 'ISPCTF{....}'
a = [
601748807654457784008912152319168422704193274988376714148917,
765952658558151413899158662683347027693656404492256964213794,

605211513888374381572291948405129696303507278768182497161373,
874997430891372481844518555228854521891874648602902630464108,

605211513888374381572291948405129696303507278768182497161373,
220039487891436733215566731307222861368796257256130819854073,
63962226167736814546835185514351236865567434339453763424,
616889733029724519300857254224791718262347281675004701158900,

874997430891372481844518555228854521891874648602902630464108,
681875866101505599883006597830529067418337394876834148937558,

84674119915309133723162820176003624180129067133327672418856,
195043847671077540330878664066165826973304941613248121514359 ]
for i in range(35):
    d = a[i]
    for i in range(1, 127):
        if rsa(i) == d:
            print(chr(i), end='')
```
4. flag là: ISPCTF{here_is_random_messageBruhh}
